meanings.definition: Psilocybins: hallucinogenic compounds found in certain types of mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the effects of psilocybins on the brain.
meanings.sent2: People should be cautious when consuming mushrooms containing psilocybins.
meanings.sent3: The mushrooms with psilocybins must have been dancing in the forest last night!
meanings.sent4: Her mind soared to new heights after ingesting the psilocybins.
meanings.sent5: The hallucinations caused by psilocybins were both fascinating and frightening.
